text: وَنَادَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فِي قَوۡمِهِۦ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَلَيۡسَ لِي مُلۡكُ مِصۡرَ وَهَٰذِهِ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِيٓۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

translation.en: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see
translation.id: Dan Firaun berseru kepada kaumnya (seraya) berkata, "Wahai kaumku! Bukankah kerajaan Mesir itu milikku dan (bukankah) sungai-sungai ini mengalir di bawahku; apakah kamu tidak melihat
